item.title: Report Says the E.U. Is Gearing Up to Weaponize Europe’s Tech Industry Against the U.S. - Gizmodo
item.description: Report Says the E.U. Is Gearing Up to Weaponize Europe’s Tech Industry Against the U.S. GizmodoEurope Prepares for a Nightmare Scenario: The U.S. Blocking Access to Tech The Wall Street JournalEurope wants to end its dangerous reliance on US internet technology The ConversationEurope’s digital reliance on US Big Tech: Does the EU have a plan?
